text: The dollar (sign: $; code: BSD) has been the currency of The Bahamas since 1966. It is normally abbreviated with the dollar sign $. Sometimes it is abbreviated B$ to show it is different from other dollars. It is divided into 100 cents. Category:Currency of North America Category:The Bahamas Category:1966 establishments in North America Category:20th-century establishments in the Bahamas
title: Bahamian dollar
